title: Individual Clinical Development Function for PROJECT
description:
INDIVIDUAL CLINICAL DEVELOPMENT FUNCTION defines the role executed by an employee of Boehringer or a CRO in the context of clinical operations. 
INDIVIDUAL CLINICAL DEVELOPMENT FUNCTION is specialized in INDIVIDUAL CLINICAL DEVELOPMENT FUNCTION FOR STUDY, INDIVIDUAL CLINICAL DEVELOPMENT FUNCTION FOR STUDY COUNTRY, INDIVIDUAL CLINICAL DEVELOPMENT FUNCTION FOR STUDY SITE. 
The values (roles types) are defined by INDIVIDUAL CLINICAL DEVELOPMENT FUNCTION TYPE.

developmentProjectImpactId.title: developmentProject.impactProjectId
developmentProjectImpactId.description: Unique ID of the development project given automatically by the CTMS
